full_summary:
# Shared Services Canada – Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement
### For Domains of Expertise: Legacy Support and Transition – Disaster Recovery

#### Overview

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for a Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement (SBIPS) for the Domains of Expertise: Legacy Support and Transition – Disaster Recovery, under the contract number EN537-05IT01. 

This requirement is open to Tier 1 SBIPS holders who have qualified for services in the National Capital Region. SSC intends to award up to one contract for a one-year term.

#### Key Details

*   Contract Award: SSC intends to award a contract for a one-year term.  
*   Security Level: Reliability  
*   Invitation to Bid: The following contractors have been invited to submit a proposal:
    *   2328713 ONTARIO INC., QA CONSULTANTS INC. (joint venture)  
    *   49 Solutions Inc.  
    *   CM Inc.  
    *   CVL INFORMATION SOLUTIONS INC.  
    *   Deloitte Inc.  
    *   DONNA CONNA INC., IBM CANADA LIMITED (joint venture)  
    *   ESI Technologies de l'information Inc.  
    *   I.M.P. Group Limited  
    *   LNW Consulting Inc  
    *   Mariner Partners Inc  
    *   Open Text Corporation  
    *   Sierra Systems Group Inc.  
    *   The Bell Telephone Company of Canada or Bell Canada  
    *   TPG Technology Consulting Ltd., Amita Corporation, RANDSTAD INTERIM INC., The Devon Group Ltd., Nortak Software Ltd., TRM Technologies Inc., Wilcom Systems Ltd (joint venture)  
    *   Unisys Canada Inc.  
*   Bid Deadline: The solicitation deadline is January 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

#### Contact Details

For further information, please contact:

*   Name: Julie Bampton  
*   Email: julie.bampton@ssc-spc.gc.ca  
*   Phone: 613-790-5915  
*   Fax: None

#### Notice Reference

This solicitation can be found at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27058/req-156172-npp---r000156172--disaster-recovery.pdf](https://canadabuys
